Package com.barchart.udt.nio

Class Summary
ChannelServerSocketUDT you must use SelectorProviderUDT.openServerSocketChannel() to obtain instance of this class; do not use JDK ServerSocketChannel.open();
example:
ChannelSocketUDT you must use SelectorProviderUDT.openSocketChannel() to obtain instance of this class; do not use JDK SocketChannel.open(); example:
SelectionKeyUDT NOTE: 1<->1 mapping between: SelectionKeyUDT -> ChannelUDT -> SocketUDT
SelectorProviderUDT you must use the same system-wide provider instance for the same TypeUDT of UDT channels and UDT selectors;
SelectorUDT you must use SelectorProviderUDT.openSelector() to obtain instance of this class; do not use JDK Selector.open()
